KishiUnnati is a teleconsultation website for farmers! We provide online/offline help to farmers in remote areaS.Farmers can get support in various agricultural activities, by the help of consultants as well as connect with their peers through the website.

patterns: What are the Features of this website?

Our Features are : Plant and it's Disease's Identifaction,Forum,ChatBot,Voice Assistant,Weather Prediction,A list of Govt Schemes helpful for farmers, Whatsapp Bot,SMS Bot,IVR service.

patterns: What can i do with forum
responses: It is a peer-to-peer consultation platform where the farmers will be able to connect with farmers as well as experts from all over the country.
Farmers can come in contact with other farmers to ask for help and give advice to each other.
The Voice Assistant is a guide through the website. You just need to speak and it will help with anything you want.
You just need to speak and the Voice Assistant will guide you and explain everything you want to know about the website.
You can find the number to your nearest centre in this xxxxxx section.

patterns: How do I sell my product here
responses: You can go to forum to sell or rent any product.

patterns: How many types of Rice are grown in India?
What are the varieties of Rice in India?
responses: There are more than 50 different varieties of Rice grown in differt parts of India. Some of them are Basmati, Dubraj, Burma Black, Gandhsale, Gobindobhog,HMT Kolam, Jawaful, Kalabati, Laxmibhog, Mysore Mallige, Parmal.

patterns: What is the best variety of rice that can be grown in Chhatisgarh?
responses: Dubraj is the best type of Rice that can be grown in Chhatisgarh.

patterns: What is the best variety of rice that can be grown in Karnataka?
What type of Rice can I grow in Karnataka?
responses: Rajamudi, Gandhsale, Burma Black is the best type of Rice that can be grown in Karnataka.

patterns: Why are leaves of my crop turning yellow?
responses: It can be because of lack of irrigaton.

patterns: What type of rice is the best to grow in West Bengal?
responses: Bhut Muri, Gobindobhog, Kamini, Laxmibhog are some of the rice that can be grown in West Bengal

patterns: What are the Kharif crops grown in India?
responses: Rice, Maize, Jowar, Bajra, Tur (arhar), Moong, Urad, Cotton, Jute, Groundnut and Soyabean are the main crops grown in the Kharif season.

patterns: What are the Rabi crops grown in India?
responses: Wheat, Barley, Oats, Pulses, Mustard and Linseed are the main crops grown in Rabi season.

patterns: What are the Zaid crops grown in India?
responses: Important crops produced during Zaid season are Watermelon, Muskmelon, Cucumber, Vegetables and Fodder crops.
